$def with (url) 
vinergy(1)                         VINERGY                           vinerge(1)

NAME
    Vinergy: CLI Pastebin within VimEnergy

SYNOPSIS
    <command> | curl -F 'vimcn=<-' $url

DESCRIPTION
    add ?<lang> to resulting url for line numbers and syntax highlighting

EXAMPLES
    ~ % cat bin/pyconsole.vim | curl -F 'vimcn=<-' $url
       ${url}/wuitE

    ~ % curl http://p.vim-cn.com/wuitE?vim
    ~ % firefox ${url}/wuitE?vim

SEE ALSO
    http://github.com/vayn/vinergy

POWERED BY
          

                                11 June 2011                         vinerge(1)
